channel.title: SAVE/LOAD GAME Issue
channel.description:
When I am in the screen being directed to choose a game to load ( I've made a number of saves - there is autosave and presave ) can't find a way of highlighting a game to LOAD the mouse doesn't work in this section and I'm all out of luck with alt-tabbing my way to select a game Must be an easy way -- don't know the configurations
anyone help please?

item.title: SAVE/LOAD GAME Issue
item.dc:creator: escape
item.description:
xpac:

Well, easy try would be to press F9 for fastload the last savegame…

its good thanks

Read full topic

( I’ve made a number of saves - there is autosave and presave )
can’t find a way of highlighting a game to LOAD
the mouse doesn’t work in this section
